data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText: refl,

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_succ,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw succ_add,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm a b,
rw add_assoc,
rw add_comm,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with c hc,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hc,
rw mul_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b hb,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hb,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_right_comm,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction t with t ht,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw ht,
rw add_assoc,
rw add_assoc,
rw ← add_assoc (b*t) a b,
rw add_comm (b*t) a,
rw  add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b hb,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hb,
rw succ_mul,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with c hc,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
rw mul_add,
rw hc,
rw mul_comm a b,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_zero,
rw one_mul,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with m hm,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw hm,
rw mul_one,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n hn,
rw add_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_one,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw hn,
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n hn,
rw pow_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_one,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw hn,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_assoc,
rw mul_assoc,
rw ← mul_assoc a (b^n) b,
rw mul_comm a (b^n),
rw mul_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with n hn,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw hn,
rw mul_succ,
rw pow_add,
refl,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
repeat {rw pow_zero},
repeat {rw one_mul},
repeat {rw succ_mul},
rw zero_mul,
rw zero_add,
rw add_mul,
rw add_mul,
rw mul_add,
rw mul_add,
rw add_comm (b*a) (b*b),
rw add_assoc,
rw add_assoc,
rw ← add_assoc (a*b) (b*b) (b*a),
rw ← add_assoc (b*b) (a*b) (a*b),
rw mul_comm b a,
rw add_comm (a*b) (b*b),
refl,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact 3*n+2,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros pqr pq p,
apply pqr,
exact p,
have q : Q := pq(p),
exact q,

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intros pq qf p,
have q : Q := pq(p),
have f : F := qf(q),
exact f,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intros pq qe p,
have q : Q := pq(p),
have e := qe(q),
exact e,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
have b : B := f1(a),
have e : E := f2(b),
have f : F := f5(e),
have g : G := f8(f),
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
exact g,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText:
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q : Q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q : Q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros pqr pq p,
have q : Q := pq(p),
apply pqr,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qr,
intro p,
apply qr,
apply pq,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
repeat {rw not_iff_imp_false},
intro pq,
intro qboom,
intro p,
apply qboom,
apply pq,
exact p,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
---parte p
exact p,

---parte q
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
cases pq with p q,
split,
---parte q
exact q,

---parte p
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qr,
split,
---parte p
cases pq with p q,
exact p,

---parte r
cases qr with q r,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro iff_pq,
intro iff_qr,
cases iff_pq with pq qp,
cases iff_qr with qr rq,
split,
---parte p -> r
  intro p,
  apply qr,
  apply pq,
  exact p,

---parte r -> p
  intro r,
  apply qp,
  apply rq,
  exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro iff_pq,
intro iff_qr,
cases iff_pq with pq qp,
cases iff_qr with qr rq,
split,
---parte p -> r
  intro p,
  apply qr,
  apply pq,
  exact p,

---parte r -> p
  intro r,
  apply qp,
  apply rq,
  exact r,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro q,
right,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
cases pq with p q,
---caso p
  right,
  exact p,

---caso q
  left,
  exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
--parte P ∧ (Q ∨ R) → P ∧ Q ∨ P ∧ R
  intro pqr,
  cases pqr with p qr,
  cases qr with q r,
  --caso Q
    left,
    split,
      exact p,

      exact q,
  --caso R
    right,
    split,
      exact p,

      exact r,

--parte P ∧ Q ∨ P ∧ R → P ∧ (Q ∨ R)
  intro pqpr,
  split,
  --parte P
    cases pqpr with pq pr,
      cases pq with p q,
      exact p,

      cases pr with p r,
      exact p,

  --parte Q ∨ R
    cases pqpr with pq pr,
      cases pq with p q,
      left,
      exact q,

      cases pr with p r,
      right,
      exact r,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro pnp,
cases pnp with p np,
exfalso,
apply np,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases np : P; by_cases nq : Q,
intros nqnp p,
exact nq,

intros nqnp p,
have np := nqnp(nq),
exfalso,
apply np,
exact p,

intros nqnp p,
exact nq,

intros nqnp p,
exfalso,
apply np,
exact p,

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
exact hs,

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
have sa_sb := succ_inj(h),
exact sa_sb,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro a_eq_b,
rw a_eq_b,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
  exact succ_inj,

  exact succ_eq_succ_of_eq,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction t with t ht,
  repeat{rw add_zero at h},
  exact h,

  repeat{rw add_succ at h},
  have at_bt := succ_inj(h),
  apply ht at_bt,

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm t a,
rw add_comm t b,
exact add_right_cancel a t b,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
  exact add_right_cancel a t b,

  intro h,
  rw h,
  refl,

data.lean: lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
have b_zero := add_left_cancel a b 0,
apply b_zero h,

data.lean: theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact zero_ne_succ a,

data.lean: lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with b,
  refl,

  rw add_succ at H,
  exfalso,
  have boom := succ_ne_zero(a+b),
  contradiction,

data.lean: lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm a b,
intro h,
exact add_left_eq_zero h,

data.lean: theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact succ_eq_add_one d,

data.lean: lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction n with n hn,
  apply zero_ne_succ 0 h,

  have n_sm := succ_inj(h),
  apply hn n_sm,

data.lean: theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
intros n_a_zero n_b_zero ab_zero,
cases b with b,
  rw mul_zero at ab_zero,
  contradiction,

  rw mul_succ at ab_zero,
  have a_zero := add_left_eq_zero(ab_zero),
  contradiction,

data.lean:
theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with b,
  right,
  refl,

  rw mul_succ at h,
  have a_zero := add_left_eq_zero(h),
  left,
  exact a_zero,

data.lean: theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
split,
  exact eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b,

  intro h,
  cases h with a_zero b_zero,
    rw a_zero,
    rw zero_mul,
    refl,

    rw b_zero,
    rw mul_zero,
    refl,

data.lean: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
data.editorText:
induction c with c hc generalizing b,
  intro h1,
  rw mul_zero at h1,
  cases b,
    refl,

    rw mul_succ at h1,
    have a_zero := add_left_eq_zero(h1),
    contradiction,

  intros h2,
  cases b,
    symmetry at h2,
    rw mul_zero at h2,
    have disj_a_Sc_zero := eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a (succ c) h2,
    cases disj_a_Sc_zero with a_zero Sc_zero,
      contradiction,

      symmetry at Sc_zero,
      exact Sc_zero,

    have abac_imp_bc := hc(b),
    repeat{rw mul_succ at h2},
    have ab_ac := add_right_cancel (a*b) a (a*c) h2,
    have bc := abac_imp_bc(ab_ac),
    rw succ_eq_succ_iff,
    exact bc,

data.lean: lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use 1,
rw add_comm,

data.lean: lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
data.editorText:
use 0,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with c hc,
use succ c,
rw hc,
rw add_comm a c,
rw ← succ_add c a,
rw add_comm,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
use a,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with x hbx,
cases hbc with y hcy,
use x+y,
rw hcy,
rw hbx,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with x hbx,
cases hba with y hay,
rw hay at hbx,
symmetry at hbx,
rw add_assoc at hbx,
have xy_zero := add_left_cancel b (y+x) 0 hbx,
rw hay,
have y_zero := add_right_eq_zero(xy_zero),
rw y_zero at ⊢,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases h with x hx,
have a_zero := add_right_eq_zero(hx.symm),
exact a_zero,

data.lean: lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
data.editorText:
cases h with x hx,
use x,
rw hx,
repeat{rw succ_add},

data.lean: theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with b hb,
  have zero_a := zero_le(a),
  right,
  exact zero_a,

  cases hb with ab ba,
    have a_sb := le_succ a b ab,
    left,
    exact a_sb,

    cases ba with x hx,
    cases x with y,
      left,
      apply le_succ,
      use 0,
      rw add_zero at hx ⊢,
      exact hx.symm,

      right,
      use y,
      rw succ_add at ⊢,
      rw add_succ at hx,
      exact hx,

data.lean: lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
data.editorText:
use 1,
refl,

data.lean: theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
data.editorText: sorry

data.lean: theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=

data.lean: lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
